CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . MOT is holding CHI's hand and he has a toy of his own in the other hand . MOT lets go of CHI and he immediately picks up the toy football with his free hand
INV talks to MOT about the warm-up task
CHI turns to watch INV leave
MOT crosses the room and sits in the chair next to the door
<bef> MOT pulls ball behind her . MOT gives the ball to CHI
CHI takes the ball and drops the other toy
<bef> MOT moves the toy CHI dropped
<bef> CHI turns and walks to the table . <aft> CHI holds out the football to MOT
<bef> CHI looks across the room . <aft> CHI looks up at MOT
<bef> CHI takes a few steps towards MOT
CHI turns to where MOT is pointing and then back to MOT
CHI hands the ball to MOT
<$=1> MOT hands the ball to CHI
MOT kneels down on the floor near CHI
CHI holds the ball and watches MOT
MOT starts to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT opens her mouth wide in exaggerated surprise then smiles
CHI's attention is fixed on the jack+in+the+box
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI takes a few steps closer
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box a few more turns until the song finishes
CHI grabs at the clown while still holding the toy football in his other hand
CHI tries to push the clown back inside of the jack+in+the+box
<bef> CHI pulls back from the jack+in+the+box
CHI switches hands and successfully puts the clown inside
MOT closes the lid on the jack+in+the+box
CHI crouches down and puts his hand near the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI backs away from the jack+in+the+box
MOT moves over to the jack+in+the+box and turns the handle until it pops
CHI looks at the football and then at the jack+in+the+box but neither one has his full attention
MOT smiles as she looks up at CHI
CHI extends his hand towards the jack+in+the+box
CHI grabs the clown and closely examines it
CHI puts down the clown and backs away from the jack+in+the+box
CHI moves back and forth indecisively still holding the football
CHI goes over and takes the hand of the clown
<aft> CHI backs away from the jack+in+the+box
CHI goes and touches the other hand of the clown
CHI tries to close the box then reaches for something on the floor instead
<aft> CHI picks up the car and stands up
CHI examines the car . <aft> CHI puts the car back on the floor and grabs the clown's head
MOT rolls the toy car on the floor
CHI pushes the clown back in the box
MOT helps CHI push the clown in the box
getting louder as CHI becomes frustrated
<bef> CHI closes the cover of the jack+in+the+box and tries to turn the handle
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box and starts turning the handle
CHI stands up and watches the jack+in+the+box
CHI glances at MOT for approximately one second
MOT glances at CHI for approximately one second
MOT continues to turn the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI bends down and touches the cover of the jack+in+the+box . CHI stands up
<bef> CHI jerks back in surprise . CHI crouches down and grabs the clown
CHI lets go of the clown and he stands up and looks at it
MOT gazes briefly at CHI as she touches the jack+in+the+box . <aft> MOT watches CHI
<aft> CHI drops the toy football into MOT's hands
<bef> CHI rushes over to the jack+in+the+box and puts the clown inside the box and tries to close the cover
CHI pushes the clown in the box and closes the cover
CHI pushes with his hand towards the box . CHI straightens up and extends his arms . <aft> CHI looks around the room swinging his arms
CHI turns to MOT still swinging his arms
MOT takes the jack+in+the+box and starts turning the handle
CHI stomps his feet up and down excitedly and then takes a few steps away from MOT
CHI continues walking away as he starts to play with a cushion that is on a chair in the room
MOT continues to turn the handle
CHI runs over and bends down to touch the clown
CHI continues to play with the clown
MOT picks up a different toy on the floor
<aft> MOT squeaks the toy duck she is holding
CHI tries to grab the duck
MOT continues to squeeze the duck as she holds it out to CHI
CHI takes the duck and squeezes it with both hands
CHI continues to squeeze the duck as he starts walking towards MOT
MOT watches what CHI is doing
<bef> CHI takes one more step and then stops to look at the object in his hands
CHI continues squeezing and examining the toy duck
INV enters the room . INV leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place and reenters at 13:46:21
INV explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV puts away the other toys on the table and gives CHI the beads to hold on to
INV takes the object out of the drawer and puts it on the table and then sets it in motion
CHI stares at the object . CHI places his right hand on the table while he holds on to the toy beads with his other hand
<bef> CHI smiles . CHI continues to look at the object
CHI plays with the beads in his hands
CHI tries to touch the object
<$=1> MOT lightly grabs CHI's hand and places it back on the table
<bef> CHI plays with the beads using both hands
CHI points at the object again
MOT extends her hand as if she was going to stop CHI again
CHI plays with the beads again
CHI stares at the object . CHI moves his mouth but does not speak
INV removes the object from the table and puts it away in the drawer
INV explains the Parent Child Interaction boxes . MOT takes the CHI out of the chair and INV gets the toy beads from CHI
INV leaves the room . CHI and MOT go over to the desk
MOT takes the first box off the desk and puts it on the floor between MOT and CHI
<aft> MOT sits on the floor . <$=1> MOT takes the ball out of the box
CHI sits down on the floor
<aft> MOT puts down the ball and picks up CHI and puts him on the floor across the room
MOT picks up the ball and sits across from CHI
CHI sits quietly on the floor
MOT rolls the ball across the floor to CHI
CHI catches the ball and holds it on his lap
CHI violently bounces the ball on the floor
<bef> MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI gets the ball and throws it towards MOT
MOT leans over and picks up the ball . <aft> MOT rolls the ball back to CHI
the ball is still rolling across the floor
CHI lets the ball bounce off him . <aft> CHI starts crawling away and over to the chair at the table
CHI pulls himself to his feet by using the chair and starts walking away
<$=1> MOT rolls the ball to CHI
CHI turns towards MOT still holding the ball
<aft> MOT moves the box over next to CHI
CHI drops the ball into the box
<bef> MOT reaches in the box . MOT hands the ball to CHI
CHI takes the ball and throws it in the box
MOT takes the ball out of the box . <aft> MOT hands the ball to CHI

CHI pauses for about one second and then throws the ball
MOT catches the ball and holds it out to CHI
CHI extends his hand in the air towards the ball
MOT pushes the ball towards CHI
<aft> MOT puts her hands out encouraging CHI to throw the ball
CHI throws the ball to MOT
<bef> MOT catches the ball . MOT holds the ball out to CHI
<bef> CHI walks over to a chair in the room . CHI touches the seat of the chair
MOT is still holding the ball out
CHI pulls at cushion trying to take it off the chair
CHI continues to try to get the cushion
CHI bends down and picks up the ball
<aft> CHI stands still as if he is going to throw the ball to MOT
MOT holds out her hands and opens her mouth in anticipation
CHI throws the ball into the box
<aft> CHI walks over to the box
MOT hands the ball to CHI
<bef> CHI takes a few more steps and throws the ball into the box
MOT reaches into the box and hands ball to CHI
<bef> CHI walks towards the desk with the ball in his hands . CHI throws the ball down on the floor
CHI bends down on the floor to retrieve the ball .
CHI throws the ball up onto the desk
<bef> MOT turns and watches as the ball starts to roll off the desk
<bef> MOT catches the ball and holds it in her hand
CHI glances at MOT and then turns to the desk
CHI puts his hands on the desk and pulls himself up so that he can look at the top of the desk
MOT accidentally drops the ball and then picks it up
<bef> CHI glances down and then turns back towards the desk . <aft> CHI reaches for the pen on the desk
<4-5> MOT puts the ball back in the box .
CHI turns towards MOT with the pen in his hand
<$=2> MOT takes the pen from CHI
MOT puts the cover on the pen and puts it on the desk
CHI walks around to the other side of the desk out of the camera's view
<bef> MOT takes the second box off the desk and puts the box with the ball in it back on the desk
CHI tries to climb up on the table
CHI walks quickly over to MOT
<2-3> MOT opens the box and takes out the cloth
CHI lowers his head to see the contents of the box
MOT unfolds the cloth and starts to lift it
<bef> holds the cloth so that CHI cannot see her face
CHI takes a half a step forward
CHI grabs for the cloth and puts it on his head
CHI shakes the blanket up and down
<1> MOT grabs affectionately at CHI's face
CHI tries to stretch the cloth between his hands
CHI puts the cloth over his head
CHI turns and starts walking away with the cloth
<aft> MOT takes the cloth from CHI
<bef> MOT raises the cloth up to hide her face
CHI takes a few steps forward and grabs at the cloth
CHI is still holding the cloth
<bef> MOT raises the cloth to hide her face
CHI grabs at the cloth and pulls it over his head
<1> MOT lets go of the cloth and lets CHI hold it
CHI swings the cloth around as he walks across the room
CHI walks over to the chair
CHI places the cloth on the seat of the chair
CHI pats the cloth with both hands then CHI puts his hands together and turns and faces MOT
MOT takes the cover off the box
CHI takes a few steps towards the box and then he turns around , grabs the cloth off the chair , and drops it into the box
<$=1> MOT holds the box open with one hand and puts the cloth in the box with the other hand
<bef> CHI crouches down and grabs the box then CHI turns the box on its side . CHI takes the cloth out of the box and shakes it
MOT is also holding the box the whole time
CHI looks down at the cloth
CHI stands in front of MOT and puts the cloth on his head
<$=1> MOT lifts up the cloth and looks underneath it
CHI stands motionless holding the cloth in the same position
MOT looks under the cloth from the side
CHI pulls the cloth off his head . <aft> CHI backs away from MOT

MOT places the cloth in the box
MOT gets on her knees and puts the box on the desk

CHI drops the cover of the box on the floor

CHI reaches for the paper . CHI picks up the paper and puts it in the box

MOT picks up the cover and puts it on the box

End of PCI - Crayons and Paper

<bef> MOT helps CHI turn around . MOT puts her arms around CHI and pulls him onto her lap

CHI tries to get away from MOT
CHI whines and starts to cry
as CHI struggles with MOT she averts him from the box and he is turned to face the door

CHI is halfheartedly pulling himself towards the door
